so_24762223: #!/bin/bash

while IFS="," read Alabama  Alaska  Arizona Arkansas  California  Colorado  Connecticut Delaware Florida  Georgia  Hawaii  Idaho  Illinois  Indiana  Iowa 
do
    echo $Alabama
done < my_file.csv

so_22234270: filename_in="inputfile.txt"  
 filename_out="outputfile.txt" 
 size="2000000000"       #2GB
 echo > $filename_out
 while [  $(stat -c%s "$filename_out") -lt "$size" ]; do
      echo file size =  $(stat -c%s "$filename_out")
      cat $filename_in >> $filename_out
done
